statements: SELECT * FROM coding_resources
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM coding_resources
SELECT resource_id, resource_description FROM coding_resources
SELECT * FROM coding_resources WHERE resource_type = 'tutorial'
SELECT resource_name, resource_description FROM coding_resources WHERE resource_type = 'book'
SELECT * FROM coding_resources WHERE resource_type = 'tutorial';
SELECT resource_name, resource_description FROM coding_resources WHERE resource_id = '1234';
SELECT resource_name FROM coding_resources WHERE resource_type IS NULL ORDER BY resource_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT resource_type FROM coding_resources WHERE resource_description LIKE '%beginner%';
SELECT COUNT(resource_id) AS total_resources FROM coding_resources;
SELECT * FROM coding_classes;
SELECT class_name, class_schedule FROM coding_classes WHERE class_location = 'Online';
SELECT class_name, class_description FROM coding_classes ORDER BY class_id DESC;
SELECT class_name, class_schedule FROM coding_classes WHERE class_id = 3;
SELECT c.class_name, cr.resource_name FROM coding_classes c INNER JOIN class_resources cr ON c.class_id = cr.class_id;
SELECT * FROM coding_classes WHERE class_name = 'Web Development'
SELECT class_name, class_description FROM coding_classes ORDER BY class_schedule DESC
SELECT class_name, class_location FROM coding_classes WHERE class_location LIKE '%City%'
SELECT cr.resource_name, cc.class_name FROM class_resources cr INNER JOIN coding_classes cc ON cr.class_id = cc.class_id
SELECT * FROM class_resources WHERE resource_type = 'Video'
SELECT * FROM resources WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, type FROM resources WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY type;
SELECT * FROM materials WHERE unit_price < 50.00;
SELECT class_name, instructor, location FROM coding_classes WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM resources;
SELECT * FROM resources WHERE type = 'book';
SELECT name, quantity FROM resources WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT material_name, quantity_available, unit_price FROM materials WHERE unit_price BETWEEN 10.00 AND 50.00;
SELECT class_name, instructor, location FROM coding_classes WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM resources WHERE quantity < 5;
SELECT * FROM CodingClasses;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name FROM CodingClasses WHERE schedule > NOW();
SELECT resource_name, quantity FROM Resources ORDER BY resource_type DESC;
SELECT student_name, email FROM Students WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT assignment_id, class_id, student_id FROM Assignments WHERE deadline < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM CodingClasses ORDER BY class_name DESC;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name, schedule FROM CodingClasses WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT student_name, email FROM Students WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT class_name, COUNT(*) AS total_assignments FROM CodingClasses JOIN Assignments ON CodingClasses.class_id = Assignments.class_id GROUP BY class_name;
SELECT resource_name, quantity FROM Resources WHERE resource_type = 'book' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT id, name, type, location FROM resources;
SELECT name, type, location, id FROM resources;
SELECT type, name, location, id FROM resources;
SELECT name, location, id, type FROM resources;
SELECT * FROM resources;
SELECT * FROM resources WHERE type = 'book';
SELECT id, location FROM resources WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT name, location FROM resources WHERE type = 'movie' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM resources WHERE type = 'music' ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT id, name, location FROM resources WHERE location LIKE '%New York%' ORDER BY name ASC, location DESC;
